title: ‘Kaanta Laga’ Girl Shefali Zariwala All Set To Enter Bigg Boss As A Wild Card Contestant
text:
She might have faded into oblivion after the her smashing 'Kaanta Laga' hit, but now Shefali Zariwala is all set for a big comeback.

According to reports, after Hindustani Bhau's surprise entry into Bigg Boss, Shefali Zariwala might show up in the next wild card entry, although an official announcement hasn’t been made.

Shefali has also posted no hints about her entry on the show. There is no post on her social media suggesting anything about it.

It's not the first time her name has surfaced as a potential Bigg Boss contestant, it's a rumour that starts every year and she never turns up.

Don't Miss 13.6 K SHARES 13.2 K SHARES 3.6 K SHARES 4.7 K SHARES 4.1 K SHARES

After her 'Kaanta Laga' fame died down, Zariwala reportedly wanted to pursue higher studies and quit the showbiz world. In 2004, she did a small cameo in Salman Khan and Akshay Kumar starrer Mujhse Shaadi Karogi.

She got married to Harmeet Singh of Meet Bros fame. However, after five years, she filed for divorce accusing him of domestic violence.

She got married to Parag Tyagi in 2014 and since then, most of her presence is on Instagram. Shefali also participated with her husband in, Nach Baliye 5 .

Last year she starred in Farhad Samji's comedy web series titled Baby Come Naa.

Talking about her acting debut, Shefali told the Indian Express “I am somebody who is very lucky. “Kaanta Laga” just fell into my lap and even Baby Come Naa. Sharing stage with such comedy veterans was so exciting. There was no way I could say no to it. Also, I love Balaji. Ekta’s casting sense is amazing and they really take care of the actors. I think to myself, why I didn’t do this earlier?”

Baby Come Naa is an adult comedy series backed by AltBalaji and also stars Shreyas Talpade, Kiku Sharda, Chunky Pandey and Mansi Scott. It joins a list of 22 original shows produced by AltBalaji, the digital wing of Ekta Kapoor’s Balaji Telefilms, and begins streaming from November 1.

Three wild card contestants have already entered the house. They are Bhojpuri superstar Khesari Lal Yadav, political speaker Tehseen Poonawalla, and foul-mouthed YouTuber Hindustani Bhau (real name Vikas Fhatak).

Source: Shefali Zariwala Instagram

According to reports, after Hindustani Bhau's surprise entrance, Zariwala might show up in the next wild card entry, although an official announcement hasn’t been made. Shefali has also posted no hints about her entry on the show ever.
